abstract: Wildlife authorities in Zimbabwe claim prominent American gynecologist Jan Casmir Sieski illegally killed lion in authorized hunt in Hwange National Park in April; report follows incident in which American dentist Walter J Palmer killed popular, protected lion named Cecil, to outrage of many.
lead_paragraph: Officials said a Pennsylvania gynecologist took part in a hunt in April outside Hwange National Park, where a lion, Cecil, was killed by an American dentist last month.

headline.main: Zimbabwe Officials Say Another American Illegally Killed a Lion in an Authorized Hunt
headline.print_headline: Zimbabwe Officials Say Another American Illegally Killed a Lion in an Authorized Hunt

snippet: Officials said a Pennsylvania gynecologist took part in a hunt in April outside Hwange National Park, where a lion, Cecil, was killed by an American dentist last month.
